QuestData.Title: Search Party
QuestData.Description: I sent a diplomat to look for allies in the ruins east of here.$b$bMy diplomat has not returned and now Kang tells me this jungle is filled with a sinister people known as the mogu.$b$bChezin is my friend and Leza's brother. To lose a brother would cause her to give in to despair. She already has enough to worry about with her fever.$b$bCould you investigate the ruins east of here and find out what happened?
QuestData.LogDescription: Search the Krasari Ruins for Chezin Dawnchaser.
QuestData.QuestCompletionLog: Speak with Chezin Dawnchaser at The Krasari Ruins in the Krasarang Wilds.
